references.reason: This paper is foundational to the MIDGARD framework, as it introduces the core denoising diffusion probabilistic models that the method leverages.

references.paper_title: SDFusion: Multimodal 3D shape completion, reconstruction, and generation
references.reason: This work provides the shape generation module within MIDGARD, enhancing the quality of generated assets, and is a critical component to the framework.
MIDGARD builds upon this work, addressing NAP's limitations by improving quality, consistency, controllability, and interpretability in articulated 3D asset generation.
This work is another important foundation for MIDGARD, as it explores controllable articulation generation, improving the framework's controllability.
The structure generation module of MIDGARD utilizes Graph Attention Networks (GATs) to process the object's structural and kinematic attributes, a key part of the method.
